description: Simple brown trousers blessed by every temple along the great pilgrimage route from Rivendell to the Grey Havens. Pilgrims who complete the journey are granted these pants as a mark of their spiritual journey. The blessings of numerous faiths combine to create powerful enchantmentsâ€”the wearer never tires from walking and can traverse any natural terrain with ease. Mountain paths, swamps, forests, and deserts all become as easy as a paved road. These pants have walked more leagues than most warriors have marched, carrying pilgrims to enlightenment.
magicEffect: +10 feet movement speed, Ignore difficult terrain from natural sources
name: Pilgrim Traveling Pants
